languages.text: "Ладно, чего это мы все о почивших, шерин? Надо бы и живых помянуть добрым словом. Фалько, например". {n}Джай сжимает стальную кисть до протестного скрипа.{/n} "Я этого ашмага на кол насажу, шерин, вот увидите. Но только не слишком толстый — чтоб подольше мучился".

traits.locale_text: "Ладно, чего это мы все о почивших, шерин? Надо бы и живых помянуть добрым словом. Фалько, например". {n}Джай сжимает стальную кисть до протестного скрипа.{/n} "Я этого ашмага на кол насажу, шерин, вот увидите. Но только не слишком толстый — чтоб подольше мучился".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."
languages.original_text: "Ладно, чего это мы все о почивших, шерин? Надо бы и живых помянуть добрым словом. Фалько, например". {n}Джай сжимает стальную кисть до протестного скрипа.{/n} "Я этого ашмага на кол насажу, шерин, вот увидите. Но только не слишком толстый — чтоб подольше мучился".

traits.locale_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale this ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale this ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “不过，干嘛要谈论那些已经不在的人呢，亲爱的？我们还有很多好听的话，要说给那些活着的人呢。比如说，法尔科。”{n}婕伊攥紧了她的钢手，发出了吱吱作响的声音。{/n}“我准备把那个坏种串在木桩上，亲爱的，你会亲眼看到的。我要选一条又细又长的木桩，这样他就有更多时间来享受它的滋味了。”
languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

traits.locale_text: “不过，干嘛要谈论那些已经不在的人呢，亲爱的？我们还有很多好听的话，要说给那些活着的人呢。比如说，法尔科。”{n}婕伊攥紧了她的钢手，发出了吱吱作响的声音。{/n}“我准备把那个坏家伙串在木桩上，亲爱的，你会亲眼看到的。我要选一条又细又长的木桩，这样他就有更多时间来享受它的滋味了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

languages.text: «Pero ¿por qué hablamos de los que ya no están, shereen? Tenemos que reservar unas buenas palabras para los vivos. Como Falco, por ejemplo». {n}Jae aprieta su mano de acero hasta que empieza a chirriar como queja.{/n} «Pienso empalar a ese ashmag en una estaca, shereen, ya lo verá. Será delgada, además, para que tenga más tiempo para apreciarla».
languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿por qué hablamos de los que ya no están, shereen? Tenemos que reservar unas buenas palabras para los vivos. Como Falco, por ejemplo». {n}Jae aprieta su mano de acero hasta que empieza a chirriar como queja.{/n} «Pienso empalar a ese ashmag en una estaca, shereen, ya lo verá. Será delgada, además, para que tenga más tiempo para apreciarla».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「でも、なぜ故人の話をするのかしら、シャリーン？生きている人のために、少しはいい言葉を残しておかなければならないわ。例えば、ファルコを倒せ、とかね」{n}ジェイは鋼鉄の手をギュッと握りしめる。{/n}「あたしがあのアッシュマグを杭に突き刺してやる。認識する時間も与えないほど細身のものを選んでやる」
languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、なぜ故人の話をするのかしら、シャリーン？生きている人のために、少しはいい言葉を残しておかなければならないわ。例えば、ファルコを倒せ、とかね」{n}ジェイは鋼鉄の手をギュッと握りしめる。{/n}「あたしがあのアッシュマグを杭に突き刺してやる。認識する時間も与えないほど細身のものを選んでやる」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aber wir sprechen wir über die Verstorbenen, Shereen? Wir müssen noch ein paar gute Worte für die Lebenden aufheben. Falco zum Beispiel." {n}Jae ballt die stählerne Hand, bis sie laut zu quietschen beginnt.{/n} "Ich werde diesen Ashmag pfählen, Shereen, wartet es nur ab. Ich werde einen schmalen Pfahl wählen, damit er es länger genießen kann."
languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

traits.locale_text: "Aber wir sprechen wir über die Verstorbenen, Shereen? Wir müssen noch ein paar gute Worte für die Lebenden aufheben. Falco zum Beispiel." {n}Jae ballt die stählerne Hand, bis sie laut zu quietschen beginnt.{/n} "Ich werde diesen Ashmag pfählen, Shereen, wartet es nur ab. Ich werde einen schmalen Pfahl wählen, damit er es länger genießen kann."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Mais pourquoi parlons-nous des morts, shereen ? Gardons plutôt notre salive pour les vivants. Falco, par exemple, {n}dit Jae en serrant son poing d'acier jusqu'à ce qu'il grince.{/n} J'empalerai cet ashmag sur un pieu, shereen, vous verrez. J'en choisirai un suffisamment fin pour lui laisser le temps de savourer ses derniers instants. »
languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

traits.locale_text: « Mais pourquoi parlons-nous des morts, shereen ? Gardons plutôt notre salive pour les vivants. Falco, par exemple, {n}dit Jae en serrant son poing d'acier jusqu'à ce qu'il grince.{/n} J'empalerai cet ashmag sur un pieu, shereen, vous verrez. J'en choisirai un suffisamment fin pour lui laisser le temps de savourer ses derniers instants. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Neden ölmüşlerden konuşuyoruz şirinim? Yaşayanlar hakkında da iki güzel kelam edelim. Falco mesela." {n}Jae, metal elini öyle bir sıkıyor ki elden itiraz niteliğinde bir gıcırtı çıkıyor.{/n} "O külboğazı kazığa oturtacağım şirinim, göreceksin. İnce bir kazıp seçeceğim, tadına yavaş yavaş varacak."
languages.original_text: "But why are we talking about the departed, shereen? We must save a few good words for the living. Take Falco, for example." {n}Jae clenches her steel hand until it starts squeaking in protest.{/n} "I will impale that ashmag on a stake, shereen, you will see. I will pick a slim one so he has more time to appreciate it."

traits.locale_text: "Neden ölmüşlerden konuşuyoruz şirinim? Birkaç güzel sözü de yaşayanlara saklayalım. Falco gibi mesela." {n}Jae, metal elini öyle bir sıkıyor ki elden itiraz edercesine bir gıcırtı çıkıyor.{/n} "O külboğazı kazığa oturtacağım şirinim, göreceksin. İnce bir tane seçeceğim ki tadına yavaş yavaş varabilsin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
